programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1998
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-Moving Kitchen (M) Ep382
programme.desc: Tuesday "iWalker" has been upgraded and changed the name into "iWalker-Moving Kitchen". James and the pretty chef, Rachel will move to different province with the mobile kitchen which costs more than 2 million NTD, and introduce to the audience the unique taste of the province.

programme.title: My Kickass Wife
programme.desc: Jade is a beautiful royal guard who is set up for marriage by the Queen in order to avoid the King setting eyes on her. Jade falls for Sean and helps him win the contest for her. After the wedding, Sean discovers her bad temper and visits a brothel in his despair. He meets and is attracted to a girl there, not knowing she has a secret agenda...

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A 28-year-old IT geek has only been in love once. Surprisingly, he ends up getting romantically involved with five different women this year and the one thing they have in common is that they all live in far flung areas of Hong Kong. After taking five intensive relationship courses within these 365 days, will he find “the-one”?

programme.title: Schemes in Antiques
programme.desc: Despite his family’s expertise in ancient Chinese relics, Xu Yuan becomes an electronics shop owner to distance himself from his disgraced family. However, when an antique is to be returned to China, Xu Yuan uncovers an ancient mystery and soon embarks on a journey that can finally restore his family’s reputation but may also cost him his life.

programme.title: That Demon Within
programme.desc: A dutiful police Dave, saves the life of a gang leader, Lin. When Lin commits another crime, Dave regrets his action and suffers from a severe mental disorder at the same time. He becomes a fugitive wanted for murder and tries to destroy Lin and his gang so as to restore his reputation as a good police officer.

programme.title: Chinese Odyssey 2002
programme.desc: Set in Ming Dynasty, young Emperor Zheng De escapes from the palace with his sister who disguised as a man. They run into a notorious wanderer who runs a restaurant with his boyish sister in Jiang Nan. The two pairs of siblings from vastly different social classes descend into an inescapable swirl of gender confusion, slapstick antics and love.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: In 1960s Hong Kong, rookie cop Xu Le cracks a robbery but gets demoted instead, as this offends a corrupt inspector. Xu meets a rich girl Bai who falls instantly in love with him one day. Will he break up with his childhood girlfriend for Bai so as to climb the social ladder, and how does Xu eventually become one of Hong Kong’s legendary detective?

programme.title: Cross
programme.desc: Lee believes people who commit suicide will go to hell. After his wife killed herself because of cancer, Lee feels the pain of people with suicidal thoughts and thinks of killing them to bring them to heaven. He then kills the four people from a suicidal website. Despite Lee seeing himself acting upon God’s will, his belief is being challenged.

programme.title: The White Storm 2: Drug Lords
programme.desc: In this epic action-thriller starring Andy Lau and Louis Koo, the two award-winning best actors star on opposing sides of a drug war. As a bounty of $100 million Hong Kong dollars is made to hunt down the biggest drug dealer in the city, Hong Kong becomes the battleground for the fight between good and evil.

programme.title: In Your Dreams
programme.desc: Heng is a high school student whose mother abandoned the family eight years ago. You Mei is a teacher whose husband is having an affair. When You Mei becomes a temporary teacher at Heng's school, the two lonely souls develop a forbidden love.

programme.title: HK Lan Kwai Fong
programme.desc: Lee is the Production head of an advertising firm who tries to improve her team’s performance by competing with Creative head Chan in the day and clubbing at Lan Kwai Fong for ideas at night. Lee runs into her ex-boyfriend before a big commercial shoot and drowns her sorrows drinking at Lan Kwai Fong, but finally picks herself up with Chan’s help.

programme.title: Invisible Target
programme.desc: Three young police officers driven by different motives decide to join forces to defeat Tien and his lethal, mercenary gang. As they team up to prevent another massive robbery, they discover that it is instigated by another unknown man. With courage, wits and dexterity, the trio are determined to not let Tien and the instigator escape.

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: In the beginning of 1997, Hong Kong's three notorious thieves who have never met one another before appear in the same restaurant. This leads to a rumour that they are joining forces to pull off something big before the Handover, though this is not something that any of them is aware of.

programme.title: Namiya
programme.desc: Namiya is a Chinese adaptation of the novel, Miracles Of The Namiya General Store, by best-selling author, Keigo Higashino. When three runaways shack up in an abandoned general store, a supernatural correspondence connects them to many lives that were all touched by the owner of the store years before they were born.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: In 1960s Hong Kong, rookie cop Xu Le cracks a robbery but gets demoted instead, as this offends a corrupt inspector. Xu meets a rich girl Bai who falls instantly in love with him one day. Will he break up with his childhood girlfriend for Bai so as to climb the social ladder, and how does Xu eventually become one of Hong Kong’s legendary detective?

programme.title: Never Too Late
programme.desc: Alex Fong and Cecilia So star as two lost souls in this romantic comedy. One has constantly been physically abused and cheated on by his girlfriend, the other was a former beer girl turned into a wandering spirit following a car accident. As the two begin to spend time together, love begins to repair their broken hearts.

programme.title: Let me Eat Your Pancreas
programme.desc: A student called “I” finds the diary of his classmate, Sakura Yamauchi, and discovers that she has a pancreatic disease. The two begin to spend more time together, but Sakura eventually pass away from her illness. But Sakura had a hidden message she wanted to convey, will “I” uncover it 12 years after her death?

programme.title: Integrity
programme.desc: Anti-corruption senior officer Chen lines up a key witness, corporate accountant Jack, to testify against a tobacco trading company CEO for bribing high-level customs officer as well as smuggling contraband cigarettes. When neither Jack nor the CEO shows up on the day of the hearing, Chen must team up with his ex-wife to launch an investigation.

programme.title: When Sun Meets Moon
programme.desc: In 1992, a heavy rainstorm caused a massive power outage in Hong Kong. Two young astrology enthusiasts, Moon and Sun, met on that starry night and fell in love. However, the path to love is not an easy one and they would need to endure parental objections and overcome challenges from teachers and friends.

programme.title: Operation Bangkok
programme.desc: A military veteran, Wu Wei and an undercover cop, Tian Ming lead a team to rescue the hostages captured by a band of thugs in an island outside of Bangkok. As they are about to leave after the rescue, Wu finds that his daughter is also kidnapped, and decides to stay on with Ming to fight the thugs and save her.

programme.title: Love is…Pyjamas
programme.desc: Underwear designer Spring and her daughter work at Hugo’s enterprise. Hugo demands a new fashion line design competition between Spring and the newly employed ex model Jojo to save his company from bankruptcy and the winner will take charge of the line. Who will win the competition and will Hugo’s enterprise be saved?

programme.title: Wine War
programme.desc: A Chinese wine expert residing in France is contacted by his childhood buddy in China to help him bid for a famous bottle of vintage wine in an auction. Little did he realize he is about to enter an age-old feud between rivaling vineyards and discover a historical mystery that might shatter the whole wine industry.

programme.title: How to Choose a Royal Bride
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager has arranged young and eligible women for Emperor Kangxi‘s selection. Kangxi is uninterested and becomes bored with the process. He decides to travel incognito as a businessman around the country when he meets Nalan Qiong Yao, who disguises herself as a man to avoid a possible arranged marriage with the Emperor…

programme.title: Nightfall
programme.desc: Detective George Lam investigates the brutal death of a Sino-British conductor and suspects he is murdered by Wong Yuen Yeung, a dumb killer who has just been released from prison. When out on a manhunt for Wong, Lam finds more revelations to the contrary and has to pursue every possibility, taking him deep into Wong’s past.

programme.title: Somewhere Winter
programme.desc: The film follows the love story of a university student, An Ran and a Taiwanese man, Qi Xiao. They met and fell in love at a concert by Chyi Chin, a Taiwanese singer, in Beijing in 1991. However, courage alone may not be enough for the lovers to stay together, and goodbyes may truly mean the end. Will An Ran and Qi Xiao meet again in 2019?

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Ting is an undercover police who infiltrates a triad and Tuen is a triad mole being planted into the police force. While Tang is tired of being an undercover cop, Tuen wishes to quit the triad and become a real police. When the triad boss sets a trap to uncover the moles' identity, the two must fight for themselves.

programme.title: Love for Life
programme.desc: Set in a small Chinese village, where an illicit trade in human blood has resulted in the spread of HIV, De Yi and Qin Qin are two fellow AIDS sufferers who unexpectedly fall in love with each other and risk everything to pursue a last chance at happiness...

programme.title: Girls VS Gangsters
programme.desc: A bachelorette weekend spins hilariously out of control when three friends wake up naked on a beach and find themselves handcuffed to a mysterious briefcase, with local gangsters in pursuit. They must regain memories of what happened that weekend if they hope to go back home safely!

programme.title: The Foreigner
programme.desc: A London businessman whose teenage daughter dies in a terrorist attack is determined to take revenge. His relentless search for the terrorists leads to a conflict with a British government official whose own past may hold the clues to identify the elusive killers.

programme.title: Legend of the Naga Pearls
programme.desc: A thief and a constable team up to save humanity from creatures known as the Winged Tribe, who lost their power of flight centuries ago after their war against mankind. They are hell-bent on seeking revenge by obtaining a mystical artifact called the Naga Pearls.

programme.title: As Tears Go By
programme.desc: Mobsters Wah and Fly are buddies. Wah loves his cousin, but cannot make their relationship work as he is a mobster. Fly infuriates a mob boss one day and got beaten up badly, implicating Wah too. He then takes up a fatal task to make amends…

programme.title: Cliff Walkers
programme.desc: The first spy thriller movie by famous Director Zhang Yi Mou, this film follows four Communist Party special agents who embark on a secret operation in the Japanese puppet state of Manchukuo in 1932. Sold out by a traitor, the agents, who split up into two teams, find themselves surrounded by threats on all sides. Can they complete their mission?

programme.title: Rhapsody of Kidnapping
programme.desc: When three tech founders end up handing over their latest inventions to a sleazy tycoon who takes them for granted, they decide to kidnap the man’s wife, mistress, love child and his grandma for a huge ransom. Little did they expect that the heartless tycoon has hired an assassin to take them out instead of paying the ransom.

programme.title: Encroach
programme.desc: University freshman Zhen Xin finds her classmates, except You Mei, very unfriendly to her, and the two quickly became good friends. Zhen Xin lives in the dormitory and constantly hears strange noises. When she was attacked by a man in black, You Mei saved her and the latter’s identity is also revealed.

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: Ying Tai disguises herself as a boy to go to school and falls hopelessly in love with her classmate, Shan Bo. After Shan Bo realizes her true identity, he proposes marriage to Ying Tai. However, as she is engaged to another man, they are kept apart. Knowing Shan Bo died in despair, Ying Tai is in deep sorrow and kills herself at his grave.

programme.title: Demon of the Lute
programme.desc: Lute demon Chin Mo has reappeared in the world to wreak havoc. Hsiao Feng Ling is ordered to help find a special bow and arrows that can counter the demon. Only Chiao Yin knows the whereabouts of the weapon. Hsiao and her classmate Old Naughty set out on an arduous journey to find Chiao. After overcoming many obstacles, they catch Chin Mo's man trying to snatch the bow and manage to stop him in time....

programme.title: My Dream Boat
programme.desc: This is a story about the complicated love relationships between a group of young friends who are entangled in a web of love and emotions.

programme.title: The Duel of the Century
programme.desc: In the mid-1980's Chu Yuan became internationally famous for starring as the nasty villain in Jackie Chan's groundbreaking worldwide hit, POLICE STORY. But for more than twenty-five years, he was famous as one of Hong Kong’s most respected directors of "Martial-art World" epics — often conceived by his remarkable collaborator, novelist Ku Lung. This was one of their last together for the Shaw Brothers Studio, but it's another revenge and mystery-tinged winner. Liu Yung and Sun Chien (the Korean kicking THE FIVE VENOM from Chang Cheh's internationally popular series) team to investigate the martial-art murders of a supposedly mortally wounded swordsman, only to find deception, double-dealings, imposters, and one deadly duel after another. No less than three choreographers are on hand to handle the multitude of martial arts, making this one of Chu Yuan's most involving and exciting efforts ever.

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: In this musical drama, Hsiu Hsiu, a beautiful shepherd girl, falls in love with a handsome boatman Ta Lung. However, she cannot afford to marry him because of her father’s towering debt from gambling. To complicate the matter, a rival suitor promises to pay off all her father's debts on one condition: that Hsiu Hsiu marries him...

programme.title: The Golden Seal
programme.desc: Dai Tian Chou practices martial arts since young so he can avenge his father’s death. He meets Wu Xiao Yan who is disguised as a man one day and is suddenly beaten by a group of gangsters. Wu begs her father to allow her to take Dai back home to recover. Little does Dai know this is his chance to take revenge.

programme.title: Carry on Doctors and Nurses
programme.desc: At St. Morant Hospital, a harried but lovely administrator must deal with lusty interns, student nurses, a delirious surgeon, a dissection fiend, a criticizing Commissioner and gross negligence at regular intervals! This comedy is based on the hugely successful British Carry On! film series.

programme.title: The Rebel Intruders
programme.desc: Thousands of displaced refugees rush to the southern towns to avoid the civil war in north China. Three such young men trained with martial arts skills become sworn brothers, and accidentally got involved in the battle of the rebel leaders in town when they save a refugee girl. Can they fight back against the rebel gangs?

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: The seventh daughter of the Jade Emperor is banished from heaven to live a mortal life as she is very mischievous. She falls in love with a young village lad Yong, who sold himself to work for the rich so as to bury his father. The goddess sisters help Yong to pay his debt so the lovebirds can be together. Is this going to end happily-ever-after?

programme.title: Return of the Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: One of Shaw Studio’s highest grossing movies ever, this is the story of Li Chin Huan, the renowned, charming and sentimental swordsman who must fight many opponents, including an evil Clan Chief, for a place in the martial arts world.

programme.title: The Daredevils
programme.desc: Corrupt general Wang Li assumes power by killing his superior. The son of the murdered superior befriends four street performers called “The Venoms”, and they help him take revenge by posing as government officials offering a peace token to the corrupt general. When Wang arrives at a warehouse, he is ambushed by the Venoms!

programme.title: Big Times for the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: Ah Niu finds a bag of jewels on the street and becomes rich. It is at this time that Uncle Zhou asks him to sign a contract to marry a girl, but it turns out to be a trap for Ah Niu to sell his house. In the end, Ah Niu becomes poor again…

programme.title: Killers Five
programme.desc: The Duke’s daughter has been kidnapped by the notorious Golden Dragon Hill bandits. A swordman named Yue Zhen Bei is assigned to save her, and expecting many dangers on the journey, Yue garners help from a group of good friends who are also kung fu masters.

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: This joyous, raucous, & colorful tunefest showcases the little seen dancing talents of celebrated kung-fu swordswoman Cheng Pei-Pei, as one of 3 girls dancing their way to the top.

programme.title: The Shaolin Avengers
programme.desc: Hu seeks to avenge his father who is being killed by the White-Browed Hermit and his gang. However, he fails in his attempt and is saved by Fang Shi Yu, a youth from Shaolin whose parents are also killed by the same villains. They learn and master the advanced Shaolin style kung fu, before Fang leads Hu and the Shaolin fellows to fight the enemies.

programme.title: The Bride from Hell
programme.desc: A young business man marries a pretty and much sought-after young bride, not knowing that she carries the spirit of a girl raped by her uncle and murdered along with her parents. Justice must be done, and it ain't pretty!

programme.title: The Magnificent Swordsman
programme.desc: The Magnificent Swordsman centres on the hero who vows vengeance against evil bandits who killed his family when he was a child. The hero recruits several friends to help the peasants rid their village of marauding bandits, the leader of the band being the man who killed his family.

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.title: Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: In the Yuan Dynasty, martial artists everywhere battle for the Heaven Sword and the Dragon Sabre, as only when these two powerful weapons combine can a secret be revealed to help one become the king of the martial arts world. As Zhang Wu Ji acquires the skills from “Nine Yang Scriptures” by chance, he is also embroiled in this lengthy battle.

programme.title: The Snake Prince
programme.desc: The Snake Prince lives on the Snake Mountain of Kwangsi with other snakes and they have lived peacefully with humans for a thousand years. All things change however, when the Snake Prince falls in love with one of the three beauties performing a sensual rain dance in the nearby village one day, and decides to marry her at all costs...

programme.title: Five Superfighters
programme.desc: A kung fu master and his three students lost everything after they are floored by a bully. To take revenge, the students find ways to learn from other kung fu masters and come back six months later to have a rematch with the bully.

programme.title: Crocodile River
programme.desc: This story has a Romeo and Juliet flavour. Two families who hate each other live across the opposite sides of a river filled with crocodiles and do not bother to have a bridge built. Their respective children meet in university and fall in love, but have to find ways to be together and resolve the hatred between their families.

programme.title: Invincible Enforcer
programme.desc: A young man is at the wrong place at the wrong time. As he offends a police inspector, he is thrown into jail and even when released, the police goes after him until he has no choice but to become a real criminal. Only a kind and beautiful probation officer is on his side, but can she help him?

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Hua, a pretty fraud, steals a brilliant diamond ring from a shop in Hong Kong and escapes to Singapore. To smuggle the ring pass customs, Hua slips it into the pocket of a stranger, Yen, but then lost track of him. Hua finally spots Yen after searching for days and does everything to get close to him in order to take the ring back.

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: The Kid with the Golden Arm
programme.desc: The government hires Yang to escort a cargo of gold to a famine stricken area. The vicious Chi Sha gang, with one of their best fighters, Golden Arm, announce their intention to hijack it by killing one of Yang's employees. As Yang gathers his own team of reputable fighters to protect his cargo, are they strong enough to hold off Golden Arm?

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Uninhibited youth Chun meets a rich girl Wen when her car breaks down and drives her home. Chun falls in love with Wen but Wen’s brother dislikes him and forbids his sister to see him. He humiliates Chun and gets Chun beaten up, so Chun takes the pistol he has found accidentally on the street to Wen’s home and shoots her brother dead.

programme.title: Twin Blades Of Doom
programme.desc: A retired martial artist is forced to return with a vengeance after his family and friends are murdered by the evil Ghost Gang. He decides to challenge the gang’s leader to a deadly duel so as to take revenge. Can he defeat the ruthless leader in the end?

programme.title: Apartment for Ladies
programme.desc: A Taiwanese singer comes to Hong Kong in search for her missing younger sister, who had arrived in Hong Kong to be discovered as a nightclub singer. She finds lodging at an apartment for women run by a man-hating landlady, Mrs Chan. However, Mrs Chan cannot confine the young ladies’ youthful vitality within the apartment.

programme.title: Dirty Ho
programme.desc: Master Wang, who is actually the 11th prince, poses as an antique connoisseur to hide his true identity. When he meets Dirty Ho, a witty con artist, Wang knows he has found the right man to help him untangle a royal succession plot...

programme.title: Pale Passion
programme.desc: Fa is an obsessive man who loves his wife Ah Hsia but is easily jealous and abuses her. When she leaves him one day, Fa hooks up with another woman, Hsing. A deadly triangle develops when Fa runs into Ah Hsia again and decides to win her back…

programme.title: Heroes Shed No Tears
programme.desc: Kao Chien Fei is a young swordsman who wields a special sword with a teardrop marked on its blade. He is charged with averting an impending crisis in the martial arts world, but the villain, Zhou Tung Lai, wishes to become the ruler in the martial arts world, and launches a scheme to pit the various heroes against one another.

programme.title: Melody of Love
programme.desc: Three young doctors pursue three hard-to-get beauties in this romantic film set in the 70s “a-go-go” era. They have no idea where to start and use Rock-paper-scissor method to match themselves with the girls. The tactics and tricks they use are hilarious and they have to reshuffle their plans when nothing leads to success!

programme.title: The Silver Fox
programme.desc: The formidable swordswoman Silver Fox was a child when her father was senselessly wounded by his step brother, and her mother raped. It is payback time eighteen years later, as her father trains her up with kung fu to take revenge on his behalf.

programme.title: Sunset
programme.desc: Teenage heart-throbs Ching Li and Paul Chin Pei come across like Annette Funicello and Frankie Avalon in the musical Sunset, a musical romp that plays similar to one of Hollywood's famous "Beach Party" movies. A car load of girls meets a car load of boys, and Ching and Paul ultimately fall in love. Yet the film takes an acrid twist and turns out to be more like a Shakespearian tragedy than a beach-babe party.

programme.desc: Lord Hanuman descends on Earth to help his devotees, Chandar and Sugna, fight against the evil forces that are trying to harm their children.

programme.desc: Photographer Ray Acharya, who has not seen much of success considering his potential, inherits a magical camera from his grandfather that transforms his life completely.

programme.desc: Amar's mother rules her house like a dictator and tortures her daughter-in-law, Sharda. After Sharda and her daughter die, Amar decides to teach his cruel family a lesson with the help of Seema.

programme.title: Saajan Ki Saheli
programme.desc: Kunti abandons her baby in order to lead a lavish life and marries a rich man. Years later, she realises that her husband is indulging in an affair and is shocked to find out the truth about the girl.

programme.title: Petta
programme.desc: In a bid to save his best friend's son Anwar, hostel warden Kaali goes against local goons. However, everything goes haywire when he is forced to face his past.

programme.title: Chhote Sarkar

programme.title: Golmaal 3
programme.desc: Cupid strikes when Pritam, a single father, comes across his college sweetheart, Geeta, in Goa. However, when their respective children go at war with each other, the two find it difficult to reunite.

programme.title: Seetharama Kalyana
programme.desc: Arya, a righteous man, falls in love with a small-town woman named Geetha, unaware of the obstacles that lie ahead for both of them.

programme.desc: Ashi travels to Switzerland to meet the suitor she is supposed to marry. However, in a case of mistaken identity, she meets another man and soon begins to fall for him.

programme.title: One By Two
programme.desc: Amit struggles with a mundane life and a recent breakup, while Samara, an aspiring dancer, tries to win a reality show. After several accidental escapes, the strangers' paths finally cross.

programme.title: Deewane Huye Paagal
programme.desc: After witnessing a murder committed by a gangster, Tanya flees to Dubai. Karan, who loves her, goes after her only to realise that she is pursued by a few more suitors and the gangster himself.

programme.title: Jeet
programme.desc: Karan, a feared hitman, falls in love with Kajal but she is married off to Raju. However, when Raju plans to expose his father's illegal activities, Karan is hired to kill him.

programme.title: Dil Ka Rishta
programme.desc: Jai, a multimillionaire, is secretly in love with Tia whose husband he kills unintentionally while driving. After she loses her memory in the accident, she eventually falls for a guilt-ridden Jai.

programme.title: Dil Ka Rishta

programme.title: Billu
programme.desc: The people in a village discover that Billu, a poor barber, is a childhood friend of the superstar Sahir Khan, who has arrived for a film shoot. They shower him with favours to introduce them to him.

programme.title: Andhadhun
programme.desc: Akash, a piano player pretending to be visually-impaired, unwittingly becomes entangled in a number of problems as he witnesses the murder of a former film actor.

programme.title: Awara Paagal Deewana
programme.desc: Dr Anmol, a dentist and henpecked husband, lives a miserable existence in New York due to his domineering wife. However, his troubles increase when he unwittingly gets embroiled in a mafia rivalry.

programme.title: Ek Aur Mrityu Pujan
programme.desc: When the shadow of evil starts taking over the world, a warrior fights for good, as an avatar of Narasimha, a lion god, who is known for destroying evil.

programme.desc: Anshul, Siddharth and Tarun each fall in love at the same time with different women. However, their relationships soon turn toxic and make them realise the dark side of love.

programme.title: Achanak

programme.desc: Grounded with a desk job by incompetent superiors, a clever CIA agent retires and writes a tell all memoir that will embarrass his bosses, prompting him to go on the run and elude them.

programme.desc: The Daily Show correspondents tackle the biggest stories in news, politics and pop culture.

programme.title: Saturday Night Live (S48) Ep5
programme.desc: Amy Schumer - You host tonight Amy Schumer.

programme.title: This is Stand-Up
programme.desc: This Is Stand-Up documentary pulls back the curtain on this cherished, but perhaps little understood art-form.

programme.title: Dinner For Schmucks
programme.desc: There's only one thing keeping aspiring executive from corporate success. Find the perfect guest to bring to his boss's monthly dinner party where winner is the one who arrives with the biggest buffoon.

programme.title: Mr. Mayor (S2) Ep2
programme.desc: Mayor Daddy - Mikaela learns that her award for flattening the homelessness curve is based on a lie, and, with James and Arpi's help, grows determined to make a change for real.

programme.title: 1883 (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Behind Us, A Cliff - Thomas and Shea recruit James and some local cowboys to corral a herd of cattle. As they begin their journey, the caravan is confronted with some of the many dangers they will face along the way.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S4) Ep4
programme.desc: Winning or Learning - John plans to put Jamie's loyalty to the test. Jimmy continues his journey with Travis. Tensions rise in the Bunkhouse.

programme.title: A Quiet Place
programme.desc: In this terrifyingly suspenseful thriller, a family must navigate their lives in silence to avoid mysterious creatures that hunt by sound.

programme.title: Meet The Wangs
programme.desc: In this hilarious tale of one-upmanship, a German family discovers that their new Chinese neighbours are better than them at everything from school to work to sports. Jealousy soon escalates to full-blown rivalry and then an all-out war.

programme.title: Angpao
programme.desc: Michael competes with his brother to get the most Angpaos for Chinese New Year but is one-upped by his brother who received extras from a mysterious man. To beat his rival, Michael must find a way to get Angpaos from the mysterious man too.

programme.title: Top End Wedding
programme.desc: Newly engaged couple Lauren and Ned are excited to plan for their dream wedding. But there’s one big problem – Lauren’s mother has just vanished. They embark on an epic road trip across Northern Australia in search of her.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: The Devil’s Moor
programme.desc: While driving with her mother, detective Sarah Kohr witnesses a robbery at a gas station and intervenes. After subduing the perpetrator who turns out to be just a 15-year-old, she has to investigate how he was able to get his hand on a live weapon.

programme.title: It Can't Be Real
programme.desc: A sobering film about moving on from childhood traumas – jazz singer Leyla grew up in a broken and dysfunctional family. A chance encounter with a mysterious photographer Murat unhinges her deep-seated pessimism in life and teaches her how to love again.

programme.title: Murder At Land's End
programme.desc: A woman’s body is found washed up on a beach. Labelled as a murder case, it resembles a sinister, old Breton legend about the transportation of dead souls. Captain Meyer takes on the case but is instead intrigued by his mysterious partner, Captain Leroy.

programme.title: Because Of You
programme.desc: Farhaan storms out of the house after an argument with his girlfriend Maya. As they try to understand one another so that they can reconcile, they are made to face their flaws and work through the conflict.

programme.title: A Little Lesson In Love
programme.desc: Taking shelter from a storm inside a cafe, Julie finds a stack of math papers left behind and a troubling love letter. It seems that a teenager had written it for her teacher, and it is up to Julie to prevent the student from doing anything stupid.

programme.title: Flesh Out
programme.desc: Aligned to the tradition of Mauritanian culture, young Verida’s impending arranged marriage means that she has to start gavage – a ritual of over-eating in order to gain a voluptuous body. Meal after meal, she feels increasingly estranged from her own body and starts to question her willful obedience to such rules.

programme.title: Brado
programme.desc: An estranged father-son duo find themselves reunited when the father needs help running the family ranch after an injury. As they train a rebellious horse for a cross-country race, the pair learns to rebuild their relationship and heal from their pain.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: The Devil’s Moor

programme.title: Black Snow

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - Procession
programme.desc: Marlene Stöhr is shot by a crossbow during the legendary “blood procession” with over 3000 horses and is on life support. Right before she was shot, she saw a precious racehorse presumed dead years ago. Two detectives are called to investigate.

programme.desc: Haunted by a tragedy, Nihat has isolated himself as a warden of a remote watchtower. He meets Seher, a hostess, and finds himself compelled to strike a companionship with her. Through their partnership, they find solace and hope in one another.

programme.title: 7 Wishes
programme.desc: Marina loses her passport on the eve of her wedding. When she fails to locate it, she takes to her last resort: a wish marathon. She asks the Universe for seven wishes and soon realises that the best blessings come in disguise.

programme.title: Kitwana
programme.desc: As a foreigner living in Malaysia, Kitwana is torn between settling down in Malaysia or his home country. Between his mother and his fiancé, he has to make a difficult choice.

programme.desc: Soccer Scout Anne heads to Istria, Croatia to be the maid of honor at her friend’s wedding. There, a talented 12-year-old player catches her attention, but she has no idea that his father was no other than her childhood sweetheart.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: The Last Star Witness - Escape to the Alps
programme.desc: After accidentally killing a man she wrongly thought was about to attack her, a traumatised Sarah Kohr is sent away on leave to forget the ordeal. But when she witnesses a man being shot at the airport, she has to help his son flee from the unknown killer.

programme.title: 7 Wishes
programme.desc: Marina loses her passport on the eve of her wedding. When she fails to locate it, she takes to her last resort: a wish marathon. She asks the Universe for seven wishes and soon realises that the best blessings come in disguise.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Murder in the Old Country
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping from a lab technician who was found guilty of the murder of his lab assistant, Inspector Sarah Kohr has to track him down. But the killer is wanted by another assassin, linked to a scandal far greater than Sarah imagined.

programme.title: Risks And Side Effects
programme.desc: When Pilates trainer Kathrin needs a new kidney, her husband’s hesitation to be her donor results in a crisis in their marriage. Faced with issues of life and death, the fragility of the couple’s relationship is laid bare.

programme.title: A Summer In Istria

programme.title: Wonderland
programme.desc: Helena is a divorced woman who has lost faith in love. Her best friend Ulli persuades her into spending Christmas at a quaint and secluded farm. They meet the charismatic farm owners, Tuure and Unna, and bond over life’s troubles – and silver linings.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Silent Night
programme.desc: The owner of the historic Sylt company Betten-Reuter, is found dead and two infamous Santa Clauses are believed to have silenced him. Known for robbery, is the notorious pair really also capable of murder?

programme.title: Container Wars S3 13
programme.desc: A container riddled with bullets, a burned-out box, and a freak accident on the lot put everyone on edge, until an out-of-this-world discovery leads to the biggest win yet.

programme.title: DC's Legends Of Tomorrow S6 14
programme.desc: When Astra and Spooner find themselves as stowaways, they learn that Constantine is still chasing the Fountain of Imperium and find themselves in 1920s Texas.

programme.title: Friends S6 16
programme.desc: In the friends' continuing speculative fantasy, Ross initiates a threesome with his wife and her female friend--and gets left out.

programme.title: Friends S6 17
programme.desc: Chandler and Monica agree to give each other homemade presents for their six-month anniversary.

programme.title: Friends S6 18
programme.desc: When a fire damages their apartment, Rachel and Phoebe must choose between living temporarily with Joey or Monica. Ross gets into trouble by dating a student. Chandler tries to help Joey's career.

programme.title: Friends S6 19
programme.desc: Ross worries when his student/girlfriend goes on vacation with her wild friends. Rachel needs a date for a ball.

programme.title: Friends S6 20
programme.desc: In this episode primarily composed of clips from earlier shows, Joey auditions for a major television role. But Chandler almost ruins everything by forgetting a telephone message.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S7 03
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr, and Q host a team building seminar that's NOT safe for work, and later, they pose as caricature artists on a boardwalk. Plus, the wheels come off for tonight's loser as he faces a confused and unamused biker gang.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S7 04
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr, and Q hit the supermarket to mess with shoppers in an epic game of Hide-and-Sneak, the guys draw straws at a BBQ joint, and tonight's loser gets a bad case of stage fright while giving the performance of his life.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S7 05
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr and Q hop behind the register at a burger joint and then head to a department store where they have only themselves to blame. And tonight's big loser gets into a rigged elevator only to find his own worst nightmare.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S7 06
programme.desc: The guys try to justify getting humiliated at a convenience store, they give conflicting info about their event planning companies at a wedding expo, and the loser awkwardly meets his celebrity childhood crush: Danica McKellar.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S7 07
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Q and Murr invade a silent library to see who can make the most noise without getting into trouble. Plus, they search for their missing wives at the mall, and tonight's two losers get iced out by the New Jersey Devils.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 16
programme.desc: When Bernadette won't go into labor, all her friends try to help out; and Howard learns that Bernadette has already chosen their son's name.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 17
programme.desc: While Leonard struggles to secure the perfect wedding venue for Sheldon and Amy, Howard and Bernadette struggle with who should work and who should stay with the kids.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 18
programme.desc: When Penny gets the opportunity to host BILL GATES at work, Leonard, Howard and Raj try to meet him, while Sheldon thinks it's a prank.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 19
programme.desc: Leonard runs against Sheldon for President of the Tenants Association. Meanwhile, Bernadette sends Howard and Raj out to find the owner of a drone that crashed in their yard.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S15 1
programme.desc: Eureka! We've found another 20 examples of modern innovations you just can't live without. We've got a belt for your booty, a robot that pours beer and an exciting new way to enjoy butter. Act now and we'll throw in our one of a kind cast, includingTodd Bridges, Jaimie Andrews, Brendon Walsh and John Enos.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S15 2
programme.desc: Gentlemen, start your engines! We've got a motorcade of 20 of the dumbest drivers to ever turn an ignition. There's a backwards biker, a superhero stopped for speeding and an extreme case of Russian road rage. Along for the ride is our celebrity castincluding Judy Gold, Danny Bonaduce, Kevin McCaffrey and Billy Kimball.

programme.title: Young Sheldon S6 13
programme.desc: For 13-year-old Sheldon Cooper, it isn't easy growing up in East Texas. And while the vulnerable, gifted and somewhat naïve Sheldon deals with the world, his family must find a way to deal with him.

programme.title: Music And Lyrics
programme.desc: Hugh Grant and Drew Barrymore star as washed-up '80s pop star with a chance for a comeback and his quirky plant lady with a knack for lyrics. Alex Fletcher (Grant--Two Weeks Notice) has been reduced to working the nostalgia circuit at county fairs and amusement parks. The charismatic and talented musician gets a chance at a comeback when reigning pop diva Cora Corman (Haley Bennett) invites him to write and record a duet with her, but there's a problem--Alex hasn't written a song in years; he's never written lyrics . . . and he has to come up with a hit in a matter of days. Enter Sophie Fisher (Barrymore--Lucky You), Alex's beguilingly plant lady, whose flair for words strikes a chord with the struggling songwriter. On the rebound from a bad relationship with the newly famous novelist Sloan Cates (Campbell Scott--Duma), Sophie is reluctant to collaborate with anyone, especially commitment-phobe Alex. Now, Alex and Sophie will have to face their fears--and the music--to find the love and success they both deserve. Written and directed by Marc Lawrence, the writer of the Miss Congeniality films and the writer/director of Two Weeks Notice.

programme.title: The Winchesters S1 10
programme.desc: The Winchesters is the epic, untold love story of how John Winchester met Mary Campbell and put it all on the line to not only save their love, but the entire world.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 20
programme.desc: While Penny and Bernadette improvise a bachelorette party for Amy, Sheldon and the guys visit a reclusive scientist in his cabin in the middle of nowhere.

programme.title: Container Wars S3 11
programme.desc: When jumbo-sized containers make their way to the yard, buyers use every trick in the book to win, big time. A bin full of outdoor BBQs could send two bidders up in flames, while a 'ready-to-go' rave unit sounds like music to the Israeli's ears. Plus, Mo and Ty feel the need for speed, but will their huge bet pay off?

programme.title: Container Wars S3 12
programme.desc: Buyers battle to prove who's king of the playground and a can full of bicycle gear gets everyone's wheels turning. Plus, a mystery container includes one item that requires a special operating license. Who'll be able to haul it off the lot?

programme.title: Container Wars S3 13

programme.title: By The Grace Of The Gods Ep12

programme.title: Tsukimichi -Moonlit Fantasy- Ep1
programme.desc: The First Night, Failed... Hero - Misumi Makoto is summoned to the otherworld to become a hero, but the Goddess there hates him and exiles him.

programme.title: Tsukimichi -Moonlit Fantasy- Ep2
programme.desc: The Second Night, Black Spider Of Disaster - Great Dragon Shin becomes Makoto’s servant. Black Spider of Disaster is approaching Demiplane where Makoto can hide.

programme.title: Tsukimichi -Moonlit Fantasy- Ep3
programme.desc: The Third Night, Human Shock - When Makoto visits the street in Demiplane where humans live, all humans point their weapons at him. What happened?!

programme.title: Tsukimichi -Moonlit Fantasy- Ep4
programme.desc: The Fourth Night,Too Late - Makoto meets a young girl, Rinon, who is looking for her missing elder sister. That night, Makoto gets attacked.

programme.title: Assault Lily Bouquet Ep3
programme.desc: Forget-Me-Not - A HUGE appears while the Lilies are training, and Riri learns of the reason why Yuyu seems different from two years ago.

programme.title: Assault Lily Bouquet Ep4
programme.desc: Fragrant Olive - Yuyu suggests Riri to recruit other girls to form a legion, which is a group of nine Lilies that fight together.

programme.title: Assault Lily Bouquet Ep5
programme.desc: Jade Vine - After finding out that it is almost Riri’s birthday, Yuyu sets out on a trip in search of ramune soda from Riri’s hometown.

programme.title: Assault Lily Bouquet Ep6
programme.desc: Violet - Riri’s legion gets a name, and the girls face a HUGE that triggers Yuyu’s painful memories of losing her own mentor.

programme.title: D.Gray-Man Ep1
programme.desc: The Boy Who Hunts Akuma - Allen Walker arrives in London to visit Black Order Headquarters. He is suspected of killing Officer Charles and is unable to investigate the case.

programme.title: D.Gray-Man Ep2
programme.desc: The Black Order - Komui finds a letter by Allen’s master. Later, Allen who is accused of being an Akuma is allowed into the headquarters.

programme.title: D.Gray-Man Ep3
programme.desc: The Ghost Of Martel - Allen and Kanda investigate town Martel and find an Innocence taken by the Akuma. Kanda refuses to help Allen and leaves with the Martel residents.

programme.title: D.Gray-Man Ep4
programme.desc: Aria Of The Land And The Night Sky - Allen is attacked by a level 2 Akuma that can imitate anybody. They learn that the ghost of Martel is not a ghost, but a moving and singing doll.

programme.title: Reincarnated As A Sword Ep9
programme.desc: The A-Rank Adventurer Is A Monster - Fran and others join the members investigating ‘Spider’s Nest’ but are challenged suddenly by an E-rank party.

programme.title: Reincarnated As A Sword Ep10
programme.desc: The Trap Of Trap Spiders - The investigation team is entering the Spider’s Nest smoothly. On the way, Fran learns how to fight from Amanda.

programme.title: Reincarnated As A Sword Ep11
programme.desc: Summoning The Demon Wolf - To find Fran, Teacher uses summon magic, taking a risk that Amanda may realise its true identity.

programme.title: Reincarnated As A Sword Ep12
programme.desc: Fran Is Looking Forward To A New Adventure - Cruz and others are being transferred and attacked by a lot of spiders. Will Fran and Teacher be able to arrive on time?

programme.desc: Dominion - The search for a home brings tragedy and triumph as baby hippo Mafuta faces new dangers. Crocodile Magamba defends her hatchlings, and Duma the cheetah struggles to make friends.

programme.title: Food Factory S6 Ep5
programme.desc: How pickled asparagus, chili-chocolate caramels, chocolate coffee syrup, ready-to-eat beet roots are made, from raw materials to finished products.

programme.title: Food Factory S6 Ep6
programme.desc: A mesmerising behind-the-scenes peek into the mega-industrial production lines. A look at some tasty treats for Christmas, hanukkah and Diwali.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Silk Road Adventure S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Venice, Albania and Turkey - Joanna starts her adventure in Venice, the European terminus of the Silk Road where she discovers how the Silk Road helped the merchants of Venice and the city state itself grow rich and powerful.

programme.title: Extreme Treks S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Iceland - The Volcanic Highlands - The central highlands of Iceland are otherworldly. Situated at an altitude of approx. 450 meters above sea level, the region experiences some of the most inhospitable weather on the planet.

programme.title: Food Factory S6 Ep7
programme.desc: Food Factory celebrates Thanksgiving with mountains of stuffing, gluten-free pumpkin pie, turkey-shaped treats, and farm-fresh cranberry sauce.

programme.title: Food Factory S6 Ep8
programme.desc: Food Factory gears up for the best fiesta ever with chili and cheese tamales, tequila margaritas, guacamole-flavoured Guacachips, and citrus and cinnamon flavoured Mexican wedding cookies.

programme.title: Spectacular Earth S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Megawave - Nazaré in Portugal is the site of the biggest ocean waves ever recorded on Earth. To understand what creates these monsters, plunge beneath the waves to reveal the sprawling landscapes of the seabed, travel to South Africa to witness the Sardine Run, capture a circular rainbow at Victoria Falls and chase tornados in the American Midwest.

programme.title: Australia with Simon Reeve S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Simon discovers why millions of tourists flock to the Gold Coast - which has now become the crime capital of Australia.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S10 Ep2
programme.desc: The Dead of Night - Sue Aikens tracks a deadly foe in Kavik; the Hailstones embark on a traditional task ahead of the freeze; Jessie Holmes adds a vital comfort to his remote camp; Ricko Dewilde guides his youngest children through the wilderness.

programme.title: Robson Green's Extreme Fishing Challenge S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Peru - Robson's next stop is Peru, where he will fish the world's largest river, its largest ocean, and one of its highest mountain ranges.

programme.title: Food Factory S6 Ep9
programme.desc: We are serving up the ultimate Movie Night snack menu with chocolatey Smarties, salty potato crisps with caramel corn, ice cream sandwiches, and moon pie bites.

programme.title: Food Factory S6 Ep10
programme.desc: On a special birthday themed episode, Food Factory serves up birthday cake ice cream, edible waffle bowls, mountains of cotton candy, and a giant chocolate piñata.

programme.title: Animals with Cameras S1 Ep1
programme.desc: In this episode, on-board cameras transform our understanding of meerkats, chimps and penguins.

programme.title: Extreme Treks S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Papua New Guinea - The Kokoda Trail - The Kokoda Trail is a single file footpath that runs in a straight line through Papua New Guinea. As hot days give way to intensely cold nights, it becomes clear why so many have died from the extreme natural elements.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return To The Wild UK S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Fair Isle - Ben Fogle returns to meet his previous contributors who set up home in remote locations. In this episode, he returns to Fair Isle, an island in Shetland in northern Scotland, where Tommy Hindman lives.

programme.title: Robson Green's Extreme Fishing Challenge S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Alaska - The final challenge of Robson's Americas tour is Alaska - The Final Frontier. Robson makes Salmon his first target...

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1 - Remarkable Reptiles Ep4
programme.desc: Africa - a continent teeming with life. While its animal aristocrats are the most familiar, lurking in the shadows is a diversity of reptiles. They’ve conquered just about every habitat and have evolved a remarkable array of adaptations that make them the undisputed masters of the underworld.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Weatherproof Ep1
programme.desc: Steer clear of these alphas, whose horns, claws, and other protective gear keep them ready for battle, no matter what the weather dishes out. Examine killer Highland cow horns, plucky mallard bills, razor-edged wolverine claws, and more.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Agile Ep2
programme.desc: Check out some fancy footwork and killer alpha moves. Catch a male brown hare throwing punches at his beloved, admire a sandhill crane dance battle, watch ibexes butt heads (literally) during mating season, and see why leopards are stealth masters.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Social Ep3
programme.desc: Meet alphas who get by with a little help from their friends. Discover the inescapable gang mentality of mating male dolphins, ponder ant colonies’ unique scents, find out why female geladas always get the last word, and see wolves hunt family-style.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Scrappy Ep4
programme.desc: Celebrate small but mighty animal warriors armed with sheaves of scary weapons. Admire nutrias’ stink bombs; honey badgers’ savage, needle-like choppers; black-tailed gulls’ razor-sharp beaks; and the killer talons on dive-bombing peregrine falcons.

programme.title: Deadly Australians 1 - Deserts Ep3
programme.desc: Behind the facade of Australia’s dramatic scenery is a motley crew of silent assassins, con artists, gang members and brutal brawlers, vying for supremacy amidst the harsh, dry and desolate Australian desert. Competition for resources is so fierce, its animal residents have developed some ingenious methods of survival.

programme.title: Deadly Australians 1 - Oceans Ep4
programme.desc: Australia is home to the world’s most toxic, venomous and dangerous creatures. From the oceans to the forest, swamps and deserts, it’s a continent teeming with a hugely disproportionate number of creatures that can envenomate, poison or maim.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - Madagascar Ep1
programme.desc: Madagascar is home to strange animals not found anywhere else on Earth. When these animals fight for supremacy, their battles are just as strange - from weird neck-wrestling weevils to ring-tailed lemur moms that go into battle with baby on board.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 - Untamed West Ep2
programme.desc: New Zealand’s West Coast is like nowhere else on Earth. From glacier-covered mountains to rain-drenched native forests to rough frigid seas, the landscape defies belief. Isolated from the rest of the world, this strip of almost untouched wilderness hides a host of endemic animals. Evolutionary castaways, every one of them is a rare ecological jewel. From alpine parrots and shy penguins to mammal-like kiwis and ancient eels. To survive the conditions the wildlife here has to be hardy, cunning and resourceful. A journey along the West Coast reveals the beauty of this land, and the trials and tribulations of the wildlife that live here.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1 - Living with Sharks Ep3
programme.desc: Sharks are among the planet’s oldest and most highly evolved predators. Along southern Africa’s coast, pioneers dedicate their lives to learning more about these creatures, and spreading awareness about their plight. These people do all they can to find safe ways of living with sharks.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1 - Remarkable Reptiles Ep4
programme.desc: Africa - a continent teeming with life. While its animal aristocrats are the most familiar, lurking in the shadows is a diversity of reptiles. They’ve conquered just about every habitat and have evolved a remarkable array of adaptations that make them the undisputed masters of the underworld.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 - Hawaii Ep4
programme.desc: Throughout the Hawaiian Islands, natural forces of creation and destruction can be observed in real-time as they work to shape the living beach. These beaches are forged inside active volcanoes: every bit of land exists here because of these red-hot furnaces.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 - Australia Ep5
programme.desc: It’s a UNESCO World Heritage Site, the largest sand island on earth, and home to wild dingoes, six-foot sand-worms, and eucalyptus woodlands. Find out how everything lives happily together in a complex ecosystem built entirely upon sand.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - Australia Ep2
programme.desc: Australia is home to an eclectic array of creatures, and the ways to succeed as an alpha are just as diverse. The beach turns into a dueling ground, and the outback becomes a boxing ring, as animals face off with their own kind.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1 - Living with Sharks Ep3

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - Savanna Ep3
programme.desc: The African savanna is an epic landscape, and whether it’s head-bashing hippos, hormone-crazed elephants or dueling lions, battles that rage on the savanna are just as epic.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - India Ep4
programme.desc: Welcome to India – a land of exotic animals and exotic warfare. Monkeys stage dusty dust-ups, blackbucks wage open war on the open plains, and peacock dandies swing switchblades: these are colorful battles worthy of a vibrant land.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 1 - Springbok & Impala: Life in the Herd Ep6
programme.desc: From the dry deserts of the west to the moist savannas of the east, these two species are pivotal in the success of both plants and animals living across this divide.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 - Rheas-Cerrado Ep8
programme.desc: Every year in the dry season, as the floodwaters disappear, the grasslands of the Pantanal are home to many species: giant anteaters, maned wolves and the greater rheas- the largest bird in South America.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Spoonbill Soft Shoe Shuffle Ep4
programme.desc: Join the team’s scramble to help a trio of distressed baby wallabies and a koala joey who’s having seizures. Scale a tree with rescuer Jo to net a wounded lizard, see kookaburra feather-implant surgery, and admire a spoonbill’s new corrective shoes.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1 - Remarkable Reptiles Ep4
programme.desc: Africa - a continent teeming with life. While its animal aristocrats are the most familiar, lurking in the shadows is a diversity of reptiles. They’ve conquered just about every habitat and have evolved a remarkable array of adaptations that make them the undisputed masters of the underworld.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - The Inside Story Ep4
programme.desc: Look behind the scenes and meet the innovative teams working to preserve and protect Kenya’s wildlife. Check out Save the Elephants’ radio-tracking-collar system, a drone that monitors wild dog packs, and a local team of Maasai cheetah trackers.

programme.title: After the Wildfires
programme.desc: Charting the long-term recovery of wildlife in the aftermath of Australia’s catastrophic bushfires through stories of hope, human intervention and resilience, this film provides an urgent message to safeguard our environment before it is too late.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Spoonbill Soft Shoe Shuffle Ep4
programme.desc: Join the team’s scramble to help a trio of distressed baby wallabies and a koala joey who’s having seizures. Scale a tree with rescuer Jo to net a wounded lizard, see kookaburra feather-implant surgery, and admire a spoonbill’s new corrective shoes.

They’ve conquered just about every habitat and have evolved a remarkable array of adaptations that make them the undisputed masters of the underworld.

programme.title: Macro Worlds 1 - God's Darling: Beetles Ep3
programme.desc: Beetles have inhabited the Earth for more than 240 million years. There are around 380,000 kinds of beetles known to scientists and every year hundreds of new species are discovered. One fourth of the world’s animals are beetles. They have conquered almost every corner and every habitat on the planet and they have survived every global disaster. What is it that makes them so successful?

programme.title: Zambia Untamed 1 - The Outcasts Ep1
programme.desc: In the Luangwa Valley lies a grove of Ebony trees, home to a troop of baboons. But, there are dangers here – the resident leopard who, unlike the other predators, is powerful and agile enough to climb trees. He’s not an easy foe to elude.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - The Coast Ep5
programme.desc: Travel to coastlines around the world, where conflict over food and accommodation leads to desperate battles for survival. Watch as penguins’ delightful dispositions turn toward murderous rage, and join a humpback whale trying to protect her calf.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - Canada Ep6
programme.desc: Canada, where summer is short and time is tight – any time is the right time to fight. The mighty North provides the setting for bison, bald eagles, and polar bears to wage some of the most heavy-duty fighting in the animal kingdom.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 1 - The Hamadryas of Awash Ep7
programme.desc: Ethiopia’s Awash National Park is home to a closely knit group where aggression plays a vital role in ensuring strong family bonds and structure. Their daily challenges with each other and the contrasting environment of Awash give way to a fascinating society.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 - Giant Otter Refuge Ep9
programme.desc: At the southern edge of the Pantanal, in one of the world’s largest tropical wetlands, Biologist Carolina Ribas and her local guide, Arilei Terena search for a giant otter den. Despite their large size, noisy and gregarious nature, endangered giant otters are notoriously shy and hard to find.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Brisbane Floods Ep5
programme.desc: Wade into recovery mode as the clinic deals with the animal aftermath of a Brisbane flood. Meet a baby kangaroo in need of round-the-clock care and a plover washed down a drain. Then size up the turtle waiting list that vet Karina patiently tackles.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Weatherproof Ep1
programme.desc: Steer clear of these alphas, whose horns, claws, and other protective gear keep them ready for battle, no matter what the weather dishes out. Examine killer Highland cow horns, plucky mallard bills, razor-edged wolverine claws, and more.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Agile Ep2
programme.desc: Check out some fancy footwork and killer alpha moves. Catch a male brown hare throwing punches at his beloved, admire a sandhill crane dance battle, watch ibexes butt heads (literally) during mating season, and see why leopards are stealth masters.

programme.title: Macro Worlds 1 - God's Darling: Beetles Ep3
programme.desc: Beetles have inhabited the Earth for more than 240 million years. There are around 380,000 kinds of beetles known to scientists and every year hundreds of new species are discovered. One fourth of the world’s animals are beetles. They have conquered almost every corner and every habitat on the planet and they have survived every global disaster. What is it that makes them so successful?

programme.title: Zambia Untamed 1 - The Outcasts Ep1
programme.desc: In the Luangwa Valley lies a grove of Ebony trees, home to a troop of baboons. But, there are dangers here – the resident leopard who, unlike the other predators, is powerful and agile enough to climb trees. He’s not an easy foe to elude.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Brisbane Floods Ep5

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon 1 - Jungle Killers Ep1
programme.desc: A jaguar stalks the riverbank. A venomous snake is on the move. A Colombian tarantula waits for night fall. Watch as these fierce predators prowl through the jungle and bite into their next great meal.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon 1 - Jungle Love Ep2
programme.desc: It’s not easy to fall in love in the jungle. Find out how these animals turn to strategic mating strategies in order to pass on their genes. Meet monkeys who like monogamy, a bird who rivals Casanova, and a spider who’ll risk his life for love.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - The Coast Ep5
programme.desc: Travel to coastlines around the world, where conflict over food and accommodation leads to desperate battles for survival. Watch as penguins’ delightful dispositions turn toward murderous rage, and join a humpback whale trying to protect her calf.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 1 - The Hamadryas of Awash Ep7
programme.desc: Ethiopia’s Awash National Park is home to a closely knit group where aggression plays a vital role in ensuring strong family bonds and structure. Their daily challenges with each other and the contrasting environment of Awash give way to a fascinating society.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep37
programme.desc: The Case Of The Pocket'S Present - Fuse asks Noddy to take a present to the Pockets. But when Noddy arrives at the Treehouse, he discovers he's carrying an empty box. The present, whatever it was, has gone! Noddy must investigate: where is the Pockets' present? But how will he ever find it when he doesn't actually know what it is? It's going to take all his detecting skills to solve this one!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep38
programme.desc: The Case Of Fuse'S New Game - When Fuse invites his friends to come for a playdate all they want to do is play his new computer game. But then suddenly the computer goes off. He soon discovers there's a power cut affecting the whole of Brickabuild. But who switched off the power? And why? Desperate to carry on with the game, Noddy decides to investigate: how can they play Fuse's new game?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep39
programme.desc: The Case Of The Pirate'S Treasure (Ex : The Case Of The Queen'S Dance) - Queen Sparklewings asks the Pirate Captain to do the first dance with her at the Queen's Dance. But when it's time to practise, the Captain can't come: someone's stolen their treasure! Noddy decides to help find the treasure so the Captain will still be able to dance. He needs to investigate: Who stole the Pirates' treasure?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep40
programme.desc: The Case Of The Empty Store - Clockwork Mouse leaves Carlton in charge of getting everything ready for the Builders' Parade. Carlton gratefully accepts Noddy's offer of help but doesn't want the Naughticorns helping too! But when Carlton goes to the Brickabuild Store for supplies, he's horrified to discover the store is empty. How will they get the parade ready now? And will Clockwork Mouse ever trust Carlton again? Noddy sets out to investigate: Who took all the stuff from the Brickabuild Store?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep37
programme.desc: The Monkey That Roared - Something strange is going on in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. Every time Raa Raa visits a friend there is a loud roar… and it wasn't him! Who could it be? Raa Raa sets off to find out

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep38
programme.desc: Something New - Raa Raa is looking for something new in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. He is so busy looking, he doesn't spot all the strange new things going on around him

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep39
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Big Book Of Noises - Topsy sets out to make her own book for story time, but everything goes wrong when Raa Raa decides to join her. Can he put things right in time?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep40
programme.desc: Dr Raa Raa - Raa Raa is busy racing round the jungle in his emergency cubbybuggy coming to the rescue for every bump and scrape. But do all his friends really need medical treatment?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep37
programme.desc: High-Tech Overload - Big Chris has got a new gadget to monitor the cars. He puts it to the test, what could possibly go wrong?!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep38
programme.desc: Workshop Chaos - Big Chris is furious when Marsha tidies up his workshop - how's he supposed to work in these conditions? Luckily Flash saves helps out by messing it up again!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep39
programme.desc: Silver Hatch Shapes Up - Conrod is having an engine tune up at Silver Hatch. He boasts that his spoilers make him faster than all the other cars… who then want to be just as fast as their V8 hero…

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep40
programme.desc: Pit Stop Perils - Mr Carburettor is fed up with Roary and Maxi constantly bickering about who is the fastest car at Silver Hatch. He decrees that the pair will have a race, and whoever wins, is the fastest - no more arguing!

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep19
programme.desc: Ring My Bell / First Mate Casper - Ring My Bell When Casper encourages Quasi to go on strike from his thankless job as chore boy, Alder and Dash make Casper take his place. First Mate Casper When Cappy needs a first mate, Casper's the only one who's up to the challenge.

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep20
programme.desc: Power Outage Part 1 + 2 - Power Outage – Part 1: A Powerful Foe When Scare School falls victim to the Baccora, Kibosh encourages the students to work together, setting booby-traps and building defences. Power Outage – Part 2: Razznik's Revenge Creature by creature, the evil entity, Baccora, robs Scare School of its powers and locks them into a magical cleptor.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep36
programme.desc: Ransom Of White Shadow/Kicked Off - White Shadow is mistaken for a celebrity snail and kidnapped; Tito gets a foosball table which quickly becomes a soccer battle ground.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Ep10
programme.desc: Enchanted Mansion / The Shell Game - While serving as Finly's magical assistant, Archibald gets lost in a spooky mansion. Archibald helps a grumpy hermit crab find a new shell.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep37
programme.desc: Who'S A Good Baby? - A brainwashed Boss Baby breaks free from overly sanitized Bubbeezee products. He rallies the Playgroup Babies to run the company out of business by breaking every product in town.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep36
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Confounding Concoction Of The Crooked Combotato - A fierce game of plot potato takes an unexpected twist when Melvin unleashes one of his most fiendish -- and carb-loaded -- creations yet.

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep36
programme.desc: Between A Rock And A Hard Place - When Hiccup and the Riders discover that Viggo is using two captured Catastrophic Quakens to build a dragon prison, they must help the dragons escape.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep36
programme.desc: Pirate Booty - After pirates invade San Lorenzo searching for mystical treasure, Puss leads them on the hunt, hoping his share will defend against the Bloodwolf

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep36
programme.desc: Get Off My Lawn - When King Julien thinks he's a crime victim, he buys the village self-defense scorpions from a shady dealer, leaving everyone armed and dangerous.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep36
programme.desc: Chummy Sparklestone / Giggleyum - When the Funtime Factory stops producing one of their frosting flavors, Poppy sets out to create a replacement. But is her new flavor, Giggleyum too delicious?/During a Troll mystery party, Cooper has the role of detective. But when the party is over, Detective Cooper – now “Chummy Sparklestone” – refuses to break character, and he’s causing problems around the village!

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep36
programme.desc: Pounder - Ty and the crew must protect the Flatirons from Pounder, a predatory Poundersaurolophus who marks his territory by hammering everything in sight

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep10
programme.desc: Slobber Power - Cutter gets a chance to be a "mom" when a newly hatched dragon bonds with him, and they'll both be needed to get the others out of a tangled mess.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep19
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Clippy Claws - Pat has a very special delivery today! Micawber's claws need clipping and Pat needs to deliver not only the claw clippers but Amy the vet too! On the way to the lighthouse though they encounter all sorts of animals needing help today – from a poorly Bonnie with a cold to a fretful Pumpkin who doesn't want to take his horse pills! Meanwhile, poor Micawber's claws are so long and he's so upset by getting them tangled up in things like Chris's scarf and the lighthouse tablecloth that he flies out of the window, carrying the tangled lighthouse keys in his claws! Chris tries to get them back and finds himself locked out of the lighthouse altogether! Luckily, Pat and Amy arrive in the SDS helicopter. Pat lowers Amy down to Micawber who is perched on top of the lighthouse and she's soon able to clip his claws and retrieve the keys. Phew! Well done Amy and well done Pat!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep20
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Sorting Machine - Pat and Jess are called to Cardiff to collect a new sorting machine when the Pencaster machine breaks down. Whilst they negotiate with Rowena Roberts, the Cardiff sorting office manager, as to how to move the heavy machine onto the SDS plane, Ben is fighting his own battles at the Pencaster office as his merry band of “helpers” from the village cause more chaos in their attempts to sort the post!After a quick tour of Gilbertson Castle, Pat and Jess manage to get the new sorting machine to Pencaster just in time to deliver a missing birthday present to Meera. Happy Birthday Meera – and well done, Postman Pat!

programme.title: Olivia Ep21
programme.desc: Olivia And The Babies - After noticing all the great compliments Mother receives on account of adorable baby William, Olivia finds herself some babies of her own: her cat Edwin and her dog Perry. Being a mum is tougher than it seems, but when Mother asks Olivia to watch William for a minute, her new skills come in handy.

programme.title: Olivia Ep22
programme.desc: Olivia'S Pirate Treasure - When Olivia and her family go to the beach, Olivia finds what she thinks is a pearl-making oyster. She enlists Ian and Julian to help her find more, imagining that they're pirates in search of buried treasure. In reality, Father explains that they've actually found clams: no pearls inside, but great for a clambake!
